title: Private Jet Crashes in Central Mexico, Seven Dead as Emergency Landing Fails
summary: A small private jet carrying ten people crashed into a business premises in Central Mexico after attempting an emergency landing. Seven bodies have been recovered as rescue teams continue to search the wreckage. The incident has sparked global concern over aviation safety and emergency response preparedness.

title: Powerful Earthquake Strikes Northern Japan, Disrupting Infrastructure and Raising Global Supply Chain Concerns
summary: A strong earthquake hit northern Japan today, disrupting transport and damaging infrastructure. Rescue teams are deployed as authorities assess casualties and aftershock risks. The event has raised global concern due to Japan’s role in technology and automotive supply chains.
